attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2002 mr blair and the government placed a 10 mph ban on the lake windamere killing off the only large natural lake in england that was left for use by water skiiers. All other waters in the lake district have had a ban placed on them with the idea that windamere would always be left for use by skiiers, the action there for taken controdicts the reasoning for bans on other lake district waters.
